text: Now here are a couple of amazing parts First of all, this is a completely different molecular mechanism So instead of cell to cell communication and tubulogenesis, here, this is cytoskeletal bending So, so what the system is doing is what you would do on an IQ test You use various tools at your disposal to get to the, to solve the problem, to get to the same goal in novel ways beyond what you would normally do Right It's creative use of the tools that you already have And think about what this means from the perspective of the system You come into the world, what can you count on Well, you can't count on your environment, we all know that
content_summary: The speaker discusses a unique molecular mechanism involving cytoskeletal bending, contrasting it with traditional cell to cell communication and tubulogenesis. The speaker also emphasizes the system's ability to use existing tools creatively to solve problems and adapt to varying environments.
